this funness was before i met the front yard

2003-04-11

I was sitting around waiting to go the dance, and people seemed to keep telling me that I should cut my hair... so I went to get a haircut, and decided to take it back to the old school, the middle school, for the party at least. Nobody got the joke, though, except Josh... maybe everybody thought it was for real. So I didn't say anything, and decided to keep it.
